queryMap.query:
SELECT ROW_ID , CLS_CD , SEQ_NO , GRP_NO , GRP_RANK_NO , GRP_LOW_NO , MAKE_MAN , SBJT , SHOWSBJT , BORD_DESC , SRCH_CNT , PROG_STAT , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM ROW_ID , CLS_CD , SEQ_NO , GRP_NO , GRP_RANK_NO , GRP_LOW_NO , MAKE_MAN , SBJT , LPAD(' ',GRP_RANK_NO *2,' ')||SBJT SHOWSBJT , BORD_DESC , SRCH_CNT , PROG_STAT , DEL_YN , INST_ID , TO_CHAR(INST_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , TO_CHAR(UPDT_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') UPDT_DTM FROM (SELECT CLS_CD , SEQ_NO , GRP_NO , GRP_RANK_NO , GRP_LOW_NO , MAKE_MAN , SBJT , BORD_DESC , SRCH_CNT , PROG_STAT , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM FROM TBDM_BORD WHERE DEL_YN = ? AND CLS_CD = ? AND SBJT LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', SBJT) AND BORD_DESC LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', BORD_DESC) AND MAKE_MAN LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', MAKE_MAN) AND SEQ_NO = NVL(? , SEQ_NO)
ORDER BY GRP_NO DESC, GRP_LOW_NO ASC) ) WHERE ROW_ID BETWEEN (? - 1) * ? + 1 AND ? * ?

SELECT COUNT(SEQ_NO) TOTCOUNT FROM TBDM_BORD WHERE DEL_YN = ? AND CLS_CD = ? AND SBJT LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', SBJT) AND BORD_DESC LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', BORD_DESC) AND MAKE_MAN LIKE NVL('%' || ? || '%', MAKE_MAN)
SELECT (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO),0) + 1 FROM TBDM_BORD) NEXTSEQNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM TBDM_BORD_ATMNT) NEXTFILESEQNO FROM DUAL
SELECT CLS_CD , SEQ_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_SIZE , FILE_NAME , FILE_URL , FILE_SIZE , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , 0 AS CHK FROM TBDM_BORD_ATMNT WHERE CLS_CD = ? AND SEQ_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDM_BORD ( CLS_CD , SEQ_NO , GRP_NO , GRP_RANK_NO , GRP_LOW_NO , MAKE_MAN , SBJT , BORD_DESC , SRCH_CNT , PROG_STAT , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDM_BORD SET GRP_LOW_NO = GRP_LOW_NO + 1 WHERE GRP_NO = ? AND GRP_LOW_NO >= ? AND GRP_RANK_NO != 0

INSERT INTO TBDM_BORD_ATMNT ( CLS_CD , SEQ_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NAME , FILE_URL , FILE_SIZE , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM ) VALUES ( ? -- cls_cd , ? -- seq_no , ? -- file_seq , ? -- file_name , ? -- file_url , ? -- file_size , ? -- inst_id , SYSDATE -- inst_dtm , ? -- updt_id , SYSDATE -- updt_dtm )
UPDATE TBDM_BORD SET SBJT = ? , BORD_DESC = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ_NO = ?
UPDATE TBDM_BORD SET SRCH_CNT = SRCH_CNT + 1 WHERE SEQ_NO = ?
UPDATE TBDM_BORD SET DEL_YN = ? WHERE SEQ_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDM_BORD_ATMNT WHERE CLS_CD = ? AND SEQ_NO = ? AND FILE_SEQ = NVL(?, FILE_SEQ)
